channel.title: Jagex isnt fair!
channel.description:
Offence Type: Breaking Rule 1 Offence Date: 4 November 2006 Appeal Date: 4 November 2006 Close Date: 4 November 2006 Reason for appeal supplied at time of appeal: I understand that what I have said is wrong. I can see how it particularly offends jagex, being based in london europe. I shouldnt have said that, i shouldnt have said something that is offensive in so much ways. I have disrespected many religions and ethnicities, but this. Ive crossed the line. I am truly sorry. Explanation of why appeal was denied: Thank you for your appeal.
We are sorry to inform you that this appeal has been denied.
We have conclusive evidence that you were in control of the account at the time of the offence and for this reason this offence will remain on your account.
We suggest you take some time to remind yourself of the Rules of RuneScape before you start playing again!
RuneScape Customer Support
Thats what i got when i APOLIISED for an offence. I mean WTF! I know I was using MY ACCOUNT when the offence happened. FTW! I apoligised! So wtf is wrong then~

item.title: Jagex isnt fair!
item.dc:creator: @O_M_F_G O M F G
item.description:
@O_M_F_G wrote:

sdcit:

Life isn’t fair, Jagex is life, piece out the logic there

1)life is gay
2)not always
3)this doesn’t prevent Jagex from fixing their own bugs and hiring more employees(I’m sure they canafford that with over several million players)

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex isnt fair!
item.dc:creator: @prickly_needle prickly needle
item.description:
@prickly_needle wrote:

Offence Type: Breaking Rule 1 Offence Date: 4 November 2006
Appeal Date: 4 November 2006 Close Date: 4 November 2006
Reason for appeal supplied at time of appeal:
I understand that what I have said is wrong. I can see how it particularly offends jagex, being based in london europe. I shouldnt have said that, i shouldnt have said something that is offensive in so much ways. I have disrespected many religions and ethnicities, but this. Ive crossed the line. I am truly sorry.
Explanation of why appeal was denied:
Thank you for your appeal.

We are sorry to inform you that this appeal has been denied.

We have conclusive evidence that you were in control of the account at the time of the offence and for this reason this offence will remain on your account.

We suggest you take some time to remind yourself of the Rules of RuneScape before you start playing again!

RuneScape Customer Support

Thats what i got when i APOLIISED for an offence. I mean WTF! I know I was using MY ACCOUNT when the offence happened. FTW! I apoligised! So wtf is wrong then~
